Title: Relates to state contracts for the services of pharmacy benefit managers under health insurance plans for state officers and employees
Summary: Requires state contracts for the services of pharmacy benefit managers under health insurance plans for state officers and employees to be procured pursuant to a reverse auction process.
LawCode: Add ยง162-a, Civ Serv L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the civil service law, in relation to state contracts for the services of pharmacy benefit managers under health insurance plans for state officers and employees
